org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui

Interface BusyLayerUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBusyLayerUI, BasicBusyLayerUI

    public interface BusyLayerUI
    LayerUI for JXLayer API providing busy feature to any swing components.

    A BusyLayerUI must subclass LayerUI.
    But LayerUI is a class and this interface can't formalize this specification anyway.

    A BusyLayerUI requires two thnigs in order to render the busy state:

    • a BusyModel for be able to knwow the progression advance and states (cancellable,determinate,undeterminate)
    • a BusyIcon for render the busy animation
    Author:
    André Sébastien (divxdede)
    See Also:
    LayerUI, AbstractBusyLayerUI
